item.title: EKC SILVER 36.04 HAS BEEN RELEASED 10-24-19. I PUT ALL MOVIES AND SHOWED BACK TO THE SELECTOR BECAUSE A DIFFERENT ADDON SEEMS TO WORK BETTER EACH DAY. THIS IS MORE EFFICIENT.

YOU NEED TO DOWNLOAD THE TEMPORARY APP TO CONTINUE YOUR SERVICE. ALL RECURRING PAYMENTS WERE STOPPED A FEW DAYS AGO.
